about_the_game:
You are Pecker, a birdlike creature with a bendable beak. Poke into a wall, bend your beak and catapult yourself upwards! Using this technique you climb through numerous levels filled with puzzles and some enemies. Alone or with up to 3 friends (local splitscreen), climb, puzzle and overcome enemies.

Climb. Explore. Collect.


Lots of destructible stuff!


Ready for a challenge?


Discover the secrets of this medieval world in different biomes: floating islands, castles, forest, snow/ice, beach/desert & more to come.

Pecker offers a unique climbing mechanic in a colorful world filled with puzzles and some enemies.

name: Pecker Demo
